main.bio: Hi, my name is Ariel Rodríguez Boza. I'm an experienced Software Developer adept at bringing forth expertise in the design, installation, testing, and maintenance of software systems. Proficient in various platforms, programming languages, and databases. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate as part of a productive team
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

testimonials.text: He is a very committed person in his work and extremely responsible. He demonstrates great development and communication skills. I'm grateful that he can be part of my work team.
